results.title: That's showbiz

results.title: That's one of my talents (Captioned)
results.brief_description: This program aims to provide school leavers with information about a range of non-traditional occupations and working styles. It shows specific examples of both “alternative” money-generating activities and life style options currently being undertaken by Victorians.

results.title: That's farming
results.creator_credit: Michael Burston, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: For Michael Burston, leaving the city and taking up farming full time was a gradual process, and one not without obstacles. From virulent weeds to natural disasters, Burston was determined to pull through.

results.title: That's entertainment. Part 2
results.creator_credit: David Melnick, Saul Chaplin and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
results.brief_description: Fred Astaire and Gene Kelly cohost a stunning gallery of classic moments in MGM history. Features memorable performances by John Barrimore, Clark Gable, Greta Garbo and many others including the Marx Brothers, Abbot and Costello, Laurel and Hardy and the inimitable W C Fields. This video includes over ninety legendary superstars.

This video includes over ninety legendary superstars.

results.title: That's entertainment
results.brief_description: For over 50 years MGM produced an array of dazzling stars and musical spectaculars. “That’s Entertainment” is a compilation of snippets and sequences from nearly 100 musicals, featuring great moments with most of the studio’s major singing and dancing stars, including Judy Garland, Fred Astaire, Eleanor Powell, Gene Kelly and many more.

results.title: That's Democracy (Captioned)
results.brief_description: A seven part program designed to give an overview of our electoral system and its development. Commencing with an outline of the principles of democracy, the programs proceed to trace the history of Government in Australia, discuss the different levels of Government and examine the role of political parties, the voting system, the conduct of elections and the use of the referendum in changing the Constitution.
